name: Out of Control Slime ARENA
description: Out of Control Slime ARENA is a game, developed in 48h for the GMTK Gamejam 2020. It is the first jam I ever joined, so it was a great learning experience and I hope to get a lot of contructive feedback. Now to the game: Since the Slimeinvasion everything is out of control...even for you! Will you be able to stop them?
